translation.en: The Four Horsemen are on the gallop.
You are a go to open the stable door. I repeat, open the stable door.
translation.zh: ‎允许开门 重复 开门

translation.en: [woman] The payload is secure, and the Horsemen are en route.
translation.zh: ‎货物装载完毕 骑士已经出发

translation.en: I think it went. Go, baby.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得只拍到了 “冲吧 宝贝”

translation.en: What are you doing? Get in here. I feel it!
translation.zh: ‎你在干什么？坐进来 我感受得到！

translation.en: [soldier 1] Any idea what the hell we're hauling?
Why we need all this firepower to protect it?
translation.zh: ‎为什么需要全副武装来保护？

translation.en: [soldier 2] Could be anything from a briefcase nuke
translation.zh:
‎什么都有可能 ‎可能是便携式核武器
‎也可能是宪法原稿

translation.en: to the original copy of the Constitution
translation.zh:
‎可能是便携式核武器
‎也可能是宪法原稿

translation.en: but the one written in the Founding Fathers' blood.
I was thinking more like headpiece to the Staff of Ra
translation.zh: ‎我觉得更可能是拉之权杖的杖头

translation.en: or, uh, Amelia Earhart but alive.
translation.zh:
‎或是阿梅莉亚埃尔哈特
‎不过是还活着的

translation.en: -So, the less you know, the better. -True.
I got you a little present for making an honest woman out of me.
translation.zh:
‎因为你先上后娶
‎我给你准备了一份小礼物

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. What? Wait, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: ‎好的 什么？等等 你在说什么？

translation.en: You are in trouble now, mister.
How about the lunar lander that was supposedly left on the moon?
translation.zh: ‎会不会是本该留在月球上的登月器？

translation.en: [soldier 2] Yeah, I like the thematic extraterrestrial reference,
translation.zh: ‎对 我喜欢天外来客方面的猜测

translation.en: seeing as we're just coming from, uh… Well, you know.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我们刚从那里出来 你懂的

translation.en: -So you're saying there's a chance. -Chance of what?
Chance we're hauling a… Well, you know.
but the Holy Grail of things we shouldn't be hauling.
translation.zh: ‎但可能是类似圣杯的那种禁忌物

translation.en: You're gonna just make me say it out loud?
I honestly don't… I mean, you're being cryptic.
All right, I'll say it. It's an alien.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我说出来吧 是外星人

translation.en: -Let's get this thing out! -[soldier 3] Hurry up!
Never mind. They're dead in there. Let's get to this one. Come on.
translation.zh:
‎不管了 他们都死在里面了
‎我们去查看这台车 快

translation.en: -[soldier 6] Guys, get to payload two! -[soldier 7] Copy that!
Mothership, this is the Four Horsemen. Do you copy?
translation.zh: ‎母舰 这里是四骑士 收到了吗？

translation.en: We're in an emergency situation, Mothership. Requesting support.
translation.zh: ‎我们遇到紧急情况 母舰 请求支援

translation.en: What is the nature of your emergency?
We've been in a serious accident, Mothership.
translation.zh: ‎我们出了严重车祸 母舰

translation.en: We got numerous fatalities for sure.

translation.zh: ‎需要救治直升机 越快越好

translation.en: [woman] Copy that, Horsemen. Dispatching medevac now.
translation.zh: ‎收到 骑士 现在派出救治直升机

translation.en: Keep your comms open while I contact the medevac.
translation.zh:
‎在我联系救治直升机的同时
‎请保持通话

translation.en: [woman] Horsemen, what is the condition of the payload?
Looks like it's busted open in the middle of the highway.
Gather whoever can walk or move and get away from the payload immediately.
translation.zh: ‎召集能行动的人员立刻离开货物

translation.en: Wait, what are you telling me to do?
[woman] Shut the fuck up and listen to me. Get your men out of there, Horsemen.
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴 听我说 让你的人离开那里

translation.en: If they can't move, leave them. You understand?
translation.zh: ‎如果他们不能动就别管了 明白吗？

translation.en: Get away from that location now! Do you copy?
-They said to stay away from it. -[soldier 9] What?
You heard what they said. We need to move now!
translation.zh: ‎你听到他们怎么说了 我们得走了！

translation.en: We need to go back. They need our help!
translation.zh: ‎我们得回去 他们需要我们帮助！

translation.en: No. There is no "they." You understand? Everyone's fucked. Come on.
translation.zh:
‎不 没有什么“他们” 明白吗？
‎大家都完了 走吧

translation.en: No, no, no. We can't stop. We got to keep moving.
translation.zh: ‎不 不能停下 我们得继续前进

translation.en: We're far enough away now. It's okay.
translation.zh: ‎现在已经够远了 没事的

translation.en: -[growling in the distance] -It's getting further away. Let's go.
-Holy shit. Are you kidding me? -That really scared me. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-我天 你逗我呢？
‎-刚才真的吓坏了

translation.en: [man] I saw what you did there.
[reporter] Thousands of protesters marched on the Capitol this morning
translation.zh:
‎今早 成千上万的抗议者
‎在国会大厦前举行游行

translation.en: in response to yesterday's historic Congressional vote
translation.zh: ‎抗议昨日国会历史性的投票

translation.en: that narrowly ratified the controversial proposal
to wipe out the last remains of the so-called Zombie Wars,
translation.zh:
‎消灭所谓的“丧尸战争”中
‎最后的残余敌人

translation.en: which drew to a dramatic end
translation.zh: ‎这一行动以戏剧性的结尾收场

translation.en: with the US military suffering massive casualties
as Vegas was walled off with the zombies left inside to haunt the abandoned city.
translation.zh:
‎拉斯维加斯已经以围墙封闭
‎让丧尸在废弃的城区里游荡

translation.en: This will mark the culmination of the president's efforts to fulfill his campaign promise
translation.zh:
‎此举标志着总统
‎将采取终极手段兑现竞选承诺

translation.en: to exterminate Las Vegas' undead population
by taking the extreme action of dropping a low-yield tactical nuclear bomb
translation.zh:
‎四天后 也就是
‎7月4日独立日的日落时分

translation.en: on the city of Las Vegas in four days' time,
coinciding with sunset on the Fourth of July holiday.
The executive order has prompted the full evacuation
translation.zh: ‎该总统令促使麦卡伦隔离营

translation.en: which has long been the target of civil rights groups
translation.zh:
‎长久以来 该隔离营
‎一直是人权组织抨击的对象

translation.en: who have argued that no evidence of infection
has been detected in the camp.
May I talk to that gentleman, please?
[man] Hey, Scott, you got a visitor.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 斯科特 有人找你
‎嘿 你是布莱田中 对吧？

translation.en: It's not every man who saves the secretary of defense
from a horde of flesh-eating monsters,
translation.zh: ‎从一群嗜血的怪物中救出来

translation.en: Mr. Tanaka, I am well aware of my situation.
translation.zh: ‎田中先生 我很清楚自己的处境

translation.en: There's $200 million in the basement vault beneath the Strip.
translation.zh: ‎赌城大道下方的地下金库有两亿美元

translation.en: Two hundred million the insurance company already reimbursed me for,
the government has already moved more than half of its military presence out of the quarantine zone,
translation.zh: ‎政府已经从隔离区调走了一半多兵力

translation.en: I want you to put together a team and get it out.
translation.zh: ‎我想让你组建一支小队取出那笔钱

translation.en: 50 million is yours to divvy up amongst whomever you take in with you.
translation.zh: ‎其中五千万美元归你 可以和队友分

translation.en: Think on it for the night.
[man on TV] You should just be happy
that this is essentially a government-funded health care solution
translation.zh: ‎这是一项政府出资的医疗方案 ‎（隔离：真相还是恐慌）

translation.en: that will put an end to all of this.
[woman] Come on, Sean. You know they're not infected.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 西恩 你知道他们没被感染

translation.en: If they were, they would be zombies already.
They're political prisoners, just people the government
translation.zh: ‎他们是政治犯 ‎政府不希望他们走上街头

translation.en: You know as well as I do, if you have questionable immigration status,
translation.zh:
‎你和我一样清楚
‎如果你移民身份有问题

translation.en: advocate for gay rights or abortion,
they have a temperature gun at your head
translation.zh: ‎他们就会假借公共安全为由

translation.en: or dragging you out of your house or your car
under the guise of public safety.
translation.zh: ‎或是把你从家里或车里拖出来

translation.en: [Sean] We've tested thousands of nukes in the Nevada desert.
translation.zh:
‎我们在内华达沙漠
‎测试过数千枚核弹了

translation.en: [man over PA] Attention detainees of Las Vegas McCarran quarantine camp.
translation.zh:
‎拉斯维加斯麦卡伦隔离营的
‎被羁留人员请注意

translation.en: This facility is in an active evacuation.
Board the shuttle bus for Barstow.
translation.zh: ‎请登上摆渡巴士前往巴斯托

translation.en: Have your current temporary health clearance card
to present to officials as you board the shuttle.
Reminder, shuttles will be leaving every 15 minutes.
translation.zh: ‎请注意 大巴每15分钟一班…

translation.en: -You guys excited for the big move? -Yeah!
Kate, let the kids finish packing.
translation.zh: ‎凯特 让孩子们把行李打包完

translation.en: Kate, I need you to promise me something.
translation.zh: ‎凯特 我要你答应我一件事

translation.en: In case anything happens to me in the next few days,
translation.zh: ‎如果我在接下来的几天里遇到不测

translation.en: just make sure the kids make it out to Barstow. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎确保孩子们抵达巴斯托 好吗？

translation.en: What do you mean? What could happen?
Geeta, that is not an option.
[whispering] Kate, she helps people get in,
crack a slot machine, slip back out.
translation.zh: ‎撬开老虎机 再偷偷溜出来

translation.en: Before anyone even knows, you're gone.
translation.zh: ‎等到有人发现时 你早就没影了

translation.en: That money is our ticket out of here,
translation.zh: ‎有了这笔钱 我们才能离开这里

translation.en: or we'll be trapped in Barstow forever.
translation.zh: ‎否则我们会永远困在巴斯托

translation.en: Listen, these guards, they don't give a shit.
translation.zh: ‎听着 这些守卫不在乎我们死活

translation.en: But for five grand, I can buy my way out, me and my kids.
translation.zh:
‎但只要给他们五千块
‎我和孩子们就能离开这里

translation.en: I have to get the kids out by Friday,
translation.zh: ‎我必须在周五前把孩子们弄出去

translation.en: and I will do whatever it takes to protect my family.
translation.zh: ‎我会不择手段保护我的家人

translation.en: Geeta, people that go in there,
-Hey, wait, wait, wait, Geeta, come on. -Just let it go, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 等等 吉塔 别这样
‎-当我没说 好吗？

translation.en: What, you don't have anything better to do?
translation.zh: ‎怎么 你没别的事可做吗？

translation.en: -The fuck you say to me, volunteer? -She didn't say anything.
translation.zh:
‎-你他妈说什么 志愿者？
‎-她什么都没说

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! Shut the fuck up!
What? Were you saying something to me?
You know, the first sign of infection is belligerence
translation.zh: ‎被感染后的第一个症状就是好斗

translation.en: and actions outside of social norms.
Look at me and hold still.
employee shuttles leave in five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎员工班车将在五分钟后出发

translation.en: I could use my rectal thermometer.
You're down a couple of decimal points.
You sure you're feeling all right?
-You sure you're not infected? -I… I'm fine.
I'm fine. I'm… I feel fine.
you're both within the margin of error, but watch it.
translation.zh:
‎你们两个都在误差范围内
‎不过小心点

translation.en: You better be on that bus, volunteer.
translation.zh: ‎赶紧去坐巴士吧 志愿者

translation.en: Do you know how easy it would be for him to make you disappear?
translation.zh: ‎你知道他做掉你有多容易吗？

translation.en: All he has to say is that you dropped a degree,
and nobody would question it, nobody.
I need you to promise me that you're not gonna do anything stupid.
Geeta, it's… it's not worth the risk.

translation.zh: ‎员工班车将在五分钟后出发…

translation.en: [Scott] Mr. Tanaka, I'm in a tough spot.
I don't like you very much.
So I hate giving you the satisfaction of taking the job, but…
translation.zh:
‎我不想接这个活
‎免得让你称心如意 可是…

translation.en: [Tanaka] You'd best to gather your team.
You'll need a helicopter pilot and a safecracker.
translation.zh:
‎你需要一个直升机飞行员
‎一个开锁人

translation.en: I'm gonna text you an address.
[woman in Spanish] I hate to ask, but…
I have to take the kids to school, and if I can't get to my job--
translation.zh:
‎我得送孩子上学
‎可是如果我没法上班…

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Careful, I'm all greasy.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 小心 我身上都是油

translation.en: -Sharkey, give her the white loaner. -[Sharkey speaks Spanish]
translation.zh: ‎沙基 把那辆白车借给她

‎-谢了 玛利亚
‎-向孩子们问好

translation.en: [Scott] So you think it's a bad idea?
It's not a matter of "think." It's a matter of "is,"
and it is a bad goddamn idea.
That much I'm guessing your ass knew before you even walked in.
translation.zh:
‎你这家伙
‎还没进门就知道我有兴趣了吧

translation.en: Everything we did, all those people we saved,
translation.zh: ‎我们做了那么多事 救了那么多人

translation.en: But what if… what if just once,
we did something just for us?
What's the split? Even however many ways?
translation.zh: ‎怎么分？不管多少人都平分吗？

translation.en: Figured you, me, and Vanderohe will take 15 million each, assuming he'll do it.
translation.zh:
‎我打算你、我和范德罗
‎一人拿1500万 如果他肯干的话

translation.en: Nobody needs to know our cut.
translation.zh: ‎其他人不需要知道我们的分成

translation.en: [chuckles] Who else is on your crazy-ass list?
[Vanderohe] So I see you had a visitor.
Talk to me. How'd it go?
[woman] Well, first time she's come to visit me in six months.
translation.zh: ‎这是她半年来头一次来看我

translation.en: We can't make small talk for more than 35 minutes
without it turning into a fight.
I'm sure that she appreciates you, even if you don't realize it.
translation.zh: ‎我敢肯定 她很感激你 ‎即使你没意识到这一点

translation.en: -Mmm. -I mean it. And if she doesn't… [whispers] …screw her.
translation.zh: ‎我说真的 如果她不感激 管她呢

translation.en: You know, when we were in it, like, when we were really in it,
translation.zh: ‎当初我们一起干的时候 我们很投入

translation.en: I never thought about the faces of all the countless monsters
translation.zh:
‎杀的怪物数不胜数
‎我从来不去想那些怪物的脸

translation.en: but now just realized, you know,
I don't know if being back in would be better or worse.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道重游故地
‎会让这种状况减轻还是加剧

translation.en: God, I can't figure that out,
but I guess there is a chance that it could be…
They should have nuked Vegas in the early '90s, but…
translation.zh:
‎他们在90年代初
‎就该核弹袭击拉斯维加斯的 可是…

translation.en: -What the hell brings you here? -[Scott chuckles]
Sucks ass. What're you guys doing here?
translation.zh: ‎烂透了 你们来这里做什么？

translation.en: -Well-- -We are putting together a crew for a job.
translation.zh:
‎-这个么…
‎-我们在为一个活召集团队

translation.en: you make two million dollars for one day's work.
[Peters] That's my share. Just for me?
translation.zh: ‎这只是我的分成 我一个人的？

translation.en: Two million dollars if it pans out?
translation.zh: ‎如果顺利的话给两百万美元？

translation.en: You don't want to know the risks or--
Why would I want to know the risks? Two million dollars? That's a lot of cash.
translation.zh: ‎我为什么要了解风险？ ‎两百万美元？那可是一大笔钱

translation.en: Listen, I hate my life so deeply,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我极度厌恶我的生活

translation.en: if I had two million dollars,
You sure you don't want to know?
I bet it has something to do with a helicopter.
translation.zh: ‎我打赌是跟直升机有关的活

translation.en: -I'm in. -[Scott] Thanks. Nice seeing you, bud.
translation.zh:
‎-我加入
‎-谢谢 朋友 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Come on. This next one's on me.
That's it, baby. That's what I'm fuckin' talking about!
translation.zh: ‎漂亮 宝贝 这才对嘛！
‎麦基古兹曼 这名字有点有印象

translation.en: This is your boy, Mikey Guzman, taping live from East Las Vegas.
translation.zh:
‎（亡灵古兹曼420） ‎麦基古兹曼
‎在东拉斯维加斯为您直播

translation.en: I counted at least five, but let me double-check. Hold on.
translation.zh:
‎我数了一下 至少有五个
‎不过让我再确认一下 等等
‎七个 我们遇到了七个蹒跚者

translation.en: There are Reddit forums devoted to this guy.
translation.zh: ‎网上有很多专门讨论他的论坛

translation.en: -Swagger, man. Hell, yeah. -That's how it's done.
Make sure to like and subscribe.
Yo, that motherfucker has a Rolex. That's ten grand at least.
translation.zh: ‎那家伙戴着劳力士 至少值一万

translation.en: What would you say about making 500 grand?
I'd say, "Who the hell do I gotta kill?"
You told me you needed a safecracker. Might be your missing piece.
translation.zh:
‎你告诉我需要一位开锁人
‎这里或许有你需要的人

translation.en: [Scott] How would you like to make 250 grand for one day's work?
This is like showing me a picture of Botticelli's Madonna of the Magnificat
translation.zh:
‎这就好比给我看
‎波提切利的油画《圣母颂歌》

translation.en: and asking me if I want to fuck her.
Okay, the man who designed this wonderful work of art,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 设计了这件绝美艺术品的人

translation.en: for the final chapter in his namesake,

translation.zh: ‎出自理查德瓦格纳的经典歌剧…

translation.en: -Mmm. -[safecracker] Can it be opened and by me?
Watch your fingers, Mr. Big Hand.
translation.zh: ‎小心你的手指 大手怪先生

translation.en: But of the world's living locksmiths,
do I represent your greatest chance of opening it?
translation.zh: ‎我是最有胜算打开它的人吗？

translation.en: I can, with humility, say yes.
It's a doorway to another realm, my friends,
and providence has brought you to me.
translation.zh: ‎和神的旨意让你们找到了我

translation.en: -By the way, what's your name? -Scott Ward.
translation.zh:
‎-对了 你叫什么？
‎-斯科特沃德

translation.en: Scott, this is Damon. That's Chambers.
translation.zh: ‎斯科特 ‎这位是达蒙 那位是钱伯斯

translation.en: -They're with me. They'll be on my dime. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-他们和我一起的 我会付他们钱
‎-好的

translation.en: -[Damon] How's it going? -Welcome to the team.
[Vanderohe] Scott, you want to tell me what's up with the kid?
translation.zh:
‎斯科特 你想告诉我
‎这孩子是来干什么的吗？

translation.en: but he doesn't look like zombie killer material.
translation.zh: ‎但他看起来不像是丧尸杀手的料

translation.en: Hi, my name is Dieter, and I'm going to open what cannot be opened.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 我叫迪特
‎我能打开一切打不开的东西

translation.en: [Scott] No, we need the kid to open the safe.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我们需要这孩子打开保险库

translation.en: We lose him, we got nothing.
translation.zh: ‎要是没了他 什么都没了

translation.en: Let's go, guys. Bring it in.
[Tanaka] Lovely to have you all gathered here today.
There is an abandoned rescue helicopter on top of the north tower, Sodom.
translation.zh:
‎北楼“索登”的楼顶上
‎有一架废弃的救援直升机

translation.en: this should be a simple in-and-out.
[Tanaka] You will enter the city with a 32-hour window.
should be no problem for a gang of tough hombres such as yourselves.
translation.zh:
‎对你们这样的一群硬汉来说
‎都不会是问题

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
How precisely do we do the zombie killing?
[Scott] Is there anybody else here who hasn't killed a zombie?
Well, we all know the basics.
Zombies, shamblers, the undead, whatever you wanna call them,
translation.zh:
‎丧尸、蹒跚者、亡灵
‎不管你想怎么称呼它们

translation.en: when it comes to killing them, it's all about the brain.
One comes at you, shoot it in the brain. It's that simple. Any questions?
translation.zh:
‎如果冲你过来了
‎瞄准脑袋开枪 就那么简单 ‎有什么问题吗？

translation.en: Yes. What if I took a big rock and smashed it into the head?
translation.zh:
‎有 如果我拿一块大石头
‎砸它脑袋呢？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, that, uh… that also would still be targeting the brain, so that would work.
translation.zh:
‎可以 因为也是瞄准脑袋了
‎所以可以的
‎抱歉 田中先生 请继续

translation.en: [Tanaka] From there, you move down the Strip.
translation.zh: ‎你们从那里向赌城大道前进

translation.en: You'll reach the casino in less than two hours.
You go in and find the generator.
The safe, beneath the south tower, Gomorrah…
translation.zh: ‎保险库就在南楼“格莫拉”的下方…

translation.en: is at the end of a hallway.
There, you'll find several nonlethal deterrents.
translation.zh: ‎那里有几处非致命的威慑性机关

translation.en: You'll have to find a way to trigger them.

translation.zh:
‎与此同时 我们无畏的
‎飞行员兼机械师

translation.en: Like a surgeon or a painter,
translation.zh: ‎像一位手术医生或画家那样

translation.en: his masterpiece rendered in barely audible clicks.
translation.zh: ‎他的杰作几乎不会发出任何声响

translation.en: Finally, she succumbs to the sheer dominance of his gentle touch.
translation.zh:
‎最终 他用温柔的触碰
‎卸下了她的防御

translation.en: Then, all you have to do is load the money on the helicopter
and fly off into the sunset.
…a full day before the nuke ever leaves the launchpad.
We're not allowed to say that anymore. It's "lemon squeezy" now.
translation.zh:
‎现在不允许这样说了
‎要说“柠檬挤挤”

translation.en: I think it's fine if he's Japanese-y.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得没关系 他就是日本小鸡

translation.en: Oh. Okay. Good job. Good job.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold on. This is the real plan? It's zombies?
translation.zh: ‎等等 ‎这就是真正的计划？要打丧尸？

translation.en: Yeah, bro, what's going on? I thought you were cool with it.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 兄弟 怎么了？
‎我以为你没意见

translation.en: You were always talking about how, if you saw a zombie, you'd fuck his shit up.
translation.zh: ‎你总说如果看到丧尸 就会揍爆它

translation.en: This is crazy. You all are gonna die.
translation.zh: ‎这太疯狂了 你们都会丧命的

translation.en: [Scott] All right, team, grab your load-out bags. See you at 6:00 a.m. sharp.
translation.zh:
‎好了 队员们 拿好你们的装备
‎早上六点准时见

translation.en: My name's Martin. I'm Mr. Tanaka's head of security.
translation.zh: ‎我叫马丁 我是田中先生的保安队长

translation.en: Anything you need, you talk to me.
I can access any hardware you might want.
translation.zh: ‎我能弄到你们想要的任何装备

translation.en: I'll also be accompanying you on this job
translation.zh: ‎我会凭借对赌场的渊博知识

translation.en: because of my extensive knowledge of the casino.
[Scott] You're insane. You know that, right?
But if it's a choice between dying on the Strip
translation.zh: ‎如果要我选择 是死在赌城大道

translation.en: and spending another day flipping patties at the Lucky Boy,
I'll gamble on a few million.
Have you given any thought to how you'll get in?
[woman over PA] Recent arrivals require a full health inspection.
translation.zh: ‎新到的人需要进行全套健康检查

translation.en: Barstow Quarantine Center is a zero-tolerance facility.
translation.zh: ‎巴斯托隔离中心是一个零容忍机构

translation.en: Without a green health clearance sticker on your key card,
translation.zh: ‎如果房卡上没有绿色健康标签

translation.en: you will not be permitted in common areas.
-What are you doing here? -I need to talk to you.
translation.zh:
‎-你来这里做什么？
‎-我要跟你谈谈

translation.en: Just hear me out. Hear me out.
Look. I know this is gonna sound crazy. But do one thing for me.
translation.zh:
‎我知道听起来会很疯狂
‎帮我一个忙吧

translation.en: Do this one thing, and I can give you $15 million.
translation.zh: ‎帮了这个忙 ‎我就给你1500万美元

translation.en: If you do this one thing for me, I will.
translation.zh: ‎如果你帮我这个忙 我就有了

translation.en: I know this is not gonna make up for what I did…
translation.zh: ‎我知道这无法弥补我所做的事

translation.en: -[scoffs] -…or what type of father I was.
translation.zh: ‎无法弥补我是个糟糕的父亲

translation.en: With $15 million, you can help these people.
translation.zh: ‎但有了1500万 你就可以帮助这些人

translation.en: You can go back to school, do whatever you want.
translation.zh: ‎你可以回到学校 做你想做的任何事

translation.en: Whatever you do with this money, I know will be the right thing.
translation.zh:
‎无论你怎么用这笔钱
‎我知道你会用于正途的

translation.en: Not bad for your first time.
I understand what beautiful little machine. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我明白 这个小玩意太赞了

translation.en: Hey, don't point a gun at me.

translation.zh: ‎哦 好的 你要喝点水吗？
‎你在开玩笑吧 这算什么？

translation.en: I swear to God, if this whole mission
translation.zh: ‎我对上帝发誓 如果整个行动

translation.en: is some insane way for you to reconnect with your daughter--
translation.zh:
‎是你为了重温父女情
‎而采取的疯狂之举…

translation.en: It's not, all right? Trust me.
She's a volunteer at the camp. She's got connections.
translation.zh: ‎她是营地的志愿者 她有关系

translation.en: She's just giving us a ride into the quarantine zone.
You really think I'd take her inside the city?

translation.zh:
‎（警告：你已进入隔离区
‎美国宪法在此无效）

translation.en: Hey, how you doing? I don't think we've officially met. My name's Martin.
translation.zh:
‎你好吗？我们还没正式见过面
‎我叫马丁

translation.en: Don't talk to me. I don't trust these people, especially you.
translation.zh:
‎别跟我说话
‎我不信任这些人 尤其是你

translation.en: -Oh. -You stay the hell away from me.
[man over PA] Detainees at the Las Vegas McCarran Quarantine Center,
translation.zh:
‎拉斯维加斯
‎麦卡伦隔离营的人员请注意

translation.en: this facility will be closed by the end of the day. No personnel…
translation.zh:
‎该设施将于今天结束前关闭
‎任何人员…
‎罪犯们 见见你们的郊狼

translation.en: Does coyote girl have a name?
You can just call me that if you want.
All right, I'll leave you guys to it.
translation.zh: ‎好了 剩下的就交给你们了

translation.en: I'll meet you outside Barstow in 24 hours.
translation.zh:
‎我会在24小时后
‎和你在巴斯托城外见

translation.en: [Kate] Hey. Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. What's wrong?
You don't think I need something bigger?
translation.zh: ‎你不觉得我需要一个更大一些的吗？

translation.en: If I give you something bigger than that, you're already dead.
translation.zh:
‎如果我给你一个更大的
‎你就已经死了

translation.en: Give me a fucking break. Really?
Dieter, try not to piss Van off.
-What did you do? -What do you mean?
-Yeah. I took her in. Her and two others. -[gasps]
translation.zh: ‎是的 我带她和另外两个人进去了

translation.en: I take a lot of people in. They need that money to get out of here.
translation.zh: ‎我带过很多人进去 ‎他们需要钱离开这里

translation.en: -They know the risks. -[Kate] She has two kids!
translation.zh:
‎-她们知道风险
‎-她有两个孩子！

translation.en: Listen, if I knew she had kids, I wouldn't have taken her.
translation.zh:
‎听着 如果我知道她有孩子
‎我是不会带她去的

translation.en: They went ahead. I… I hung back.
translation.zh: ‎她们去了 我在原地等着

translation.en: They never came out. I'm sorry.
I waited, Kate, as long as I could, but at the end of the day-- I'm coming with you.
translation.zh:
‎-我尽力等了 但最终…
‎-我跟你们一起去

translation.en: We're not having this conversation. You're not coming.
There are two kids whose mother is lost in there.
translation.zh: ‎两个孩子的妈妈在里面失踪了

translation.en: Two kids that I help look out for.
Well, tell us what she looks like. We'll look out for her.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我们她长什么样 我们去找她

translation.en: -You think I trust you to do that? -Kate!

translation.zh:
‎-你不能来！
‎-我不是在征求你的意见！

translation.en: I'm telling you what's gonna happen.
Listen to me. As someone who's seen what this looks like,
translation.zh: ‎听我说 作为一个见识过那里的人

translation.en: this is not a path you wanna go down. I'm not gonna let you try.
translation.zh:
‎这不是一条你想走的路
‎我不会让你去尝试的
‎你待在这里 我们去找你的朋友

translation.en: We'll look for your friend. I'll see you when we get out.
translation.zh:
‎你待在这里 我们去找你的朋友 ‎-出来后我去找你 行吗？
‎-不行

‎-出来后我去找你 行吗？
‎-不行 ‎不 不行

translation.en: I can go in with you, and you can keep me safe.
translation.zh: ‎我要么跟你们一起进去 你能保护我

translation.en: -Kate. -Or-- Or… I'll just sneak in after you,
translation.zh:
‎-凯特
‎-要么… ‎我偷偷跟你们进去

translation.en: If we see your friend, great.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们见到你朋友 很好

translation.en: But you are not to run off looking for her. This is life or death.
translation.zh: ‎但你不能跑去找她 ‎这是生死攸关的事

translation.en: And if you screw around, some of these people are gonna die.
translation.zh: ‎如果你乱来 这些人中会有人丧命

translation.en: So you are never, ever to leave my sight.
Those are my terms. Are we clear?
translation.zh: ‎我的条件就这些 清楚吗？

translation.en: [officer] You having a good time? What's he talking about?
The bomb that's coming to kill you? Is that what you're talking about?
translation.zh:
‎有核弹会来杀了你们？
‎你是在说这个吗？

translation.en: [man over PA] This is a mandatory evacuation zone.
-We're going to need one more guy. -For what?
You don't know what it's like in there. Not anymore.
translation.zh:
‎你不了解里面的情况
‎现在和以前不一样了

translation.en: -The team's big enough-- -Trust me. We need another person.
translation.zh:
‎-小队人够多了
‎-相信我 我们还需要一个人

translation.en: What the hell's going on here?
I don't fucking get it. Why the fuck would she bring him?
translation.zh:
‎我他妈的不明白
‎为什么她要带上他？

translation.en: Honey, easy with the f-bombs, okay?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 别爆粗口 好吗？

translation.en: We're about to march into a sea of dead people and commit grand larceny.
translation.zh: ‎我们都要闯进死人堆 犯盗窃重罪了

translation.en: -But excuse me for swearing. -That's for you.
translation.zh:
‎-但我不能爆粗
‎-对 那是给你的

translation.en: We're gonna have some fun, yeah?
translation.zh: ‎我们会玩得很开心的 是吧？

translation.en: I'm telling you, you got the right guy for this.
And also, if you happen to get scared in there or nervous,
translation.zh: ‎如果你在那里害怕或是紧张了

translation.en: I want you to stay close to me.
Don't ever touch my saw again, okay? Don't ever talk to her again…
translation.zh: ‎别再碰我的电锯 好吗？ ‎别再跟她说话…
‎好了 伙计们 我们出发！

translation.en: Hey. It's not too late to go back.
Weren't smart enough to get out of the sun.
translation.zh: ‎不够聪明 不知道躲着太阳

translation.en: You should see what happens when it rains.
For a few hours, they all come back to life.
translation.zh: ‎几小时后 它们就复活了

translation.en: You sure know your way around here.
How much you know about how these things operate?
translation.zh: ‎你对这些东西的行径了解多少？

translation.en: [Chambers] Holy shit. What is all this?
[Lilly] Where the police and military finally fell.
translation.zh: ‎这是警察和军队战败的地方

translation.en: -What the hell is that? -Get behind the car! Go!
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么情况？
‎-到车后面去！快！

translation.en: She was one of Siegfried and Roy's.
translation.zh: ‎它以前是“白老虎兄弟”魔术组合的

translation.en: She guards the beginning of their territory.
Hey, Cummings. Let me see your gun for a second.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 卡明斯 让我看看你的枪

translation.en: I would say I was hoping I wouldn't have to do that, but I'd be lying.
translation.zh: ‎我想说我希望不必如此 但那是撒谎

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -What is she doing?
She just shot me. Shoot her!
They'll know we're here. They won't care so long as we play by their rules.
translation.zh:
‎它们会知道我们来了
‎只要照规矩来 它们就不会惹我们

translation.en: -Rules? De qué habla esta pendeja? -[Guzman] O sea, está loca.
translation.zh:
‎-规矩？这白痴在说什么？
‎-她真是疯了

translation.en: If we wanna go further, we have to make a trade.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们想深入这里 就要做交易

translation.en: Yes. An offering to show our subservience.

translation.zh:
‎-它们不会思考
‎-朝那个贱人开枪！

translation.en: -If they come, we kill them. -[Lilly] You don't understand.
translation.zh:
‎-如果它们来 我们就杀了它们
‎-你不懂

translation.en: -They're not what you think they are. -[Cummings] Shoot her in the face!
translation.zh:
‎-它们不是你想的那样
‎-朝她脸开枪！
‎你说得对 它们不会思考

translation.en: They just move and eat. But we're talking about the other ones.
translation.zh:
‎它们只会走走吃吃
‎但我说的是另一种

‎-阿尔法
‎-对 它们更聪明 行动更迅速

translation.en: They're organized. Straight out of your fucking nightmares.
translation.zh: ‎它们有组织性 完全是噩梦

translation.en: You all keep talking about the city like it's their prison.
translation.zh:
‎你们都把这个城市
‎当成关押它们的监狱

translation.en: They won't mind us poking around the outside so long as we play by their rules.
translation.zh:
‎只要我们按规矩来
‎它们就不会介意我们在外围活动

translation.en: -[Cummings] Oh my God! -We're moving into the heart of it now.
translation.zh:
‎-天哪！
‎-但我们要进入核心区了

translation.en: I have a mother. I love her.
Well, everyone has a mom, you cunt,
translation.zh: ‎所有人都有妈妈 你这个杂碎

translation.en: but not everyone is an abuser lording power over quarantined women.
translation.zh:
‎但不是所有人都会仗势欺人
‎伤害隔离区的女性

translation.en: [Cummings sobbing] She's lying! That's not true.
[Lilly] Shut your mouth. I've seen what you've done to those women.
translation.zh:
‎给我闭嘴
‎我看过你怎么对待那些女人的…

translation.en: [Cummings] Oh my God! That's not true at all.
-She? What's she? -[Cummings] No, please. We bonded. Please.
translation.zh:
‎-她？她是什么？
‎-不 求你了 给我松绑

translation.en: No. No, no, no. Don't trust her.
Help me. Don't go. No, we're a team.
translation.zh: ‎帮帮我 别走 不 我们是一个团队

translation.en: Help. Shoot this! What the fuck is this thing?
translation.zh: ‎救命 开枪啊！这他妈是什么玩意？

translation.en: Come on. Help me, help me, help me, help me.
No! No, no, no, no, no.
Don't do it. Just stay away.
Go away. Go over there. Go over there.
-[Scott] You ever seen her kill anyone? -[Lilly] Couple times.
translation.zh:
‎-你见过她杀人吗？
‎-见过好几次

translation.en: [Lilly] My theory, this started with one of them, an original.
translation.zh: ‎我推测最先只有一只 一位始祖

translation.en: [Lilly] Whoever that is, if he bites you--
translation.zh: ‎不管他是谁 只要他咬了你

translation.en: -[Vanderohe] Then you become an alpha. -[Lilly] Exactly.
Looks like they're taking him to the Olympus.
translation.zh: ‎看来它们要把他带去奥林匹斯酒店

translation.en: Good. Now we know where not to go.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我们现在知道哪里不能去了

translation.en: [Lilly] I've never figured out exactly how it works.
All I know is they take you in there, and you come out like one of them,
translation.zh:
‎我只知道它们把你带走后
‎你就变成它们的一员了…

translation.en: -So, they're taking him there to turn him. -[Lilly] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-它们把他带去那里 是要转化他？
‎-没错

translation.en: Scott, that could be where Geeta is.
translation.zh: ‎斯科特 吉塔可能在那里

translation.en: Kate, we've already talked about this.
translation.zh: ‎凯特 我们谈过这个问题

translation.en: -[Kate] We have time. -[Scott] It's not an option.
So, the shithead buys us passage, and we keep going?
translation.zh:
‎那个混蛋换来了通行证
‎我们继续前进？

translation.en: Well, yeah. The shithead should buy us some goodwill,
translation.zh: ‎没错 那个混蛋应该能换来一点善意

translation.en: but I'm not about to flaunt it by walking on their streets.
translation.zh: ‎但我不想在它们的街上招摇过市

translation.en: If we want to go further, we go indoors.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们想往前走 得走室内

translation.en: Hey, uh, has there been any thought given to triage?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你考虑过人员分级吗？

translation.en: Well, I mean, obviously, the German is the most important person
translation.zh:
‎我是说 那个德国佬
‎显然是最重要的人

translation.en: but barring that, it's got to be me, right?
translation.zh: ‎除他之外 就是我了 对吧？

translation.en: Because without me, you can't fly the chopper out of here.
translation.zh: ‎因为没有我 你们就无法飞离这里

translation.en: So that would make me second most important.
And I don't know if you two are tied for third or whatever,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你俩算第三重要还是什么的

translation.en: but I'm certainly more important than that guy.
Sorry. I didn't know you were listening. I am way…
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我不知道你在听 我…

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, I am definitely more important than that guy.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我绝对比那家伙重要

translation.en: You know why he was hired?
He was hired to keep tabs on us
for when we open the safe, that we didn't take the money and run.
translation.zh: ‎确保我们打开保险库后不会卷钱走人

translation.en: I'm not trying to be the bad guy,
What? What's everybody looking at me for?
It's a free country. People can look at whoever they want.
translation.zh: ‎这是自由国度 ‎想看谁就看谁

translation.en: Actually, it's not a free country. We're not in America anymore.
translation.zh:
‎其实 这不是自由国度
‎我们已经不在美国了

translation.en: Which technically makes it an even freer country, right?
translation.zh: ‎确切来说 这里就更自由了 对吧？

translation.en: What the fuck is this? [shouting indistinctly]
Hey. Let me talk to you for a second.
-I can help you. Just let me-- -[snarls loudly]
Let's just talk turkey for a second. I--
Don't shine the light in their eyes.
I've seen this before. They're hibernating.
translation.zh: ‎我以前见识过 它们在冬眠

translation.en: If we can't see them, how are we supposed to move forward?
translation.zh: ‎如果我们看不到它们 要怎么前进？

translation.en: Why? You want to check out my ass?
No. I don't trust you to have our backs if shit goes bad.
translation.zh:
‎不 如果出了岔子
‎我不放心把背后交给你

translation.en: I've been watching you, and you're up to something.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在观察你 你心怀鬼胎

translation.en: When we all get to the casino,
I think we need to have a little conversation
about what exactly your role is here.
translation.zh: ‎你在这项任务里扮演的角色

translation.en: -Where's Chambers? -[Martin] She was right behind me.
translation.zh:
‎-钱伯斯在哪？
‎-我以为她在我身后

translation.en: -What happened? What did you do? -I didn't do anything.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么回事？你干了什么？
‎-我什么也没干

translation.en: She started shooting. I wasn't close to her.
translation.zh: ‎她开始开枪 我离她有点远

translation.en: Bullshit! She was back there with you! I know she was!
translation.zh: ‎胡扯！刚才她和你在一起！我知道！

translation.en: She's gone! Come on. Leave her! She's dead!
translation.zh:
‎她没救了！快走
‎别管她了！她死定了！

translation.en: We gotta move. Come on, move!
There's no way Geeta's alive, right?
translation.zh: ‎吉塔不可能还活着 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, look at these things.
Don't be so sure. I brought a guy in once.
translation.zh:
‎不要那么肯定
‎我有一次带一个人进来

translation.en: Lost sight of him. Had to leave him. I thought he was dead.
translation.zh:
‎找不到他 只能把他抛下
‎我以为他死了

translation.en: Then three days later, he came walking back out.
[Lilly] Said they took him to the Olympus.
translation.zh: ‎说他们把他带到奥林匹斯酒店

translation.en: Shoved him in a room with two other people.
translation.zh: ‎把他和另外两人扔到一间屋子里

translation.en: The leader, he came for them one by one.
translation.zh: ‎那个首领一个一个转化他们

translation.en: If my guy hadn't escaped, he would have been next.
translation.zh: ‎如果那人不逃走 就会是下一个

translation.en: So that's a pretty common theme for you?
Do you think I enjoy having to leave people?
I'm doing what I can to make things right.
translation.zh: ‎我只是在尽可能做正确的事

translation.en: Yeah, another set of blueprints to the safe.
translation.zh: ‎对 保险库的另一套蓝图

translation.en: Tanaka had other teams here before us.
translation.zh:
‎他在找我们之前
‎已经派过几拨人来了

translation.en: Do you know anything about this?
Peters, get up to the roof.
Get that chopper running as fast as possible. Cruz, go with her.
translation.zh:
‎尽快发动直升机
‎克鲁兹 你跟她一起去

translation.en: Look, I'm excited to see my friends again, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我再次见到朋友很兴奋 好吗？

translation.en: Me and the coyote will do a perimeter check, board up the doors.
translation.zh: ‎我和郊狼去查看周围 封住门

translation.en: Yeah. Kate and I are gonna find the generators.
translation.zh: ‎好 我和凯特去找发电机

translation.en: Backup gennie's on the third-floor roof. That's gonna be your safer bet.
translation.zh:
‎备用发电机在三楼屋顶
‎这会是最保险的方案

translation.en: Van, get Dieter down to the vault.
Dieter, access card for the outer doors to the safe and the service elevators.
translation.zh:
‎迪特 保险库大门
‎和运货电梯的通行卡

translation.en: It's by the cashiers windows that way.
This should get you inside. Here.
[chuckles] That one's mine. I got another one.
translation.zh: ‎这张是我的 我还有一张给你

translation.en: All right. Everybody knows what they're doing. Let's get it done.
translation.zh: ‎大家都分配好工作了 开工吧

translation.en: No la vayas a cagar, my friend.
Spend all his money on that fucking miniature?
Guilt finally get the better of you?
One too many out there to die?
Matter of fact, yes, it has.
did you shoot her in the leg too?
I've never left anyone I didn't have to
translation.zh: ‎不是万不得已 我不会抛下任何人

translation.en: You have no idea what I've seen in those camps.
translation.zh: ‎你不知道我在营里都见识了什么

translation.en: What those people have to do to survive.
translation.zh: ‎那些人为了活命被迫做过什么

translation.en: At least within these walls, the rules are clear.
translation.zh: ‎至少在这些墙内 规则很清楚

translation.en: You don't see them fucking each other over.
The second one's just for fun.
[Scott] You understand that I had to do it, right?
You know, all those things they were saying… about me after.
-I want to make sure you know I loved her. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我想让你知道我是爱她的
‎-好

translation.en: If I ever made it seem like that wasn't the case, I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
‎如果我以前
‎让你觉得我不爱她 对不起

translation.en: You did what you had to do.
She was one of them. It…
You think that's why I haven't been talking to you all these years?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得这些年
‎我是因为这个才不理你吗？

translation.en: -Seemed like the logical assumption. Yeah. -[scoffs] No.
translation.zh: ‎似乎挺合逻辑的 没错 ‎不是的

translation.en: What you did and what happened to her,
I never blamed you for that, ever.
Well, I don't… I don't get it.
If it wasn't what happened, what the hell was it?
translation.zh: ‎如果不是因为那件事 那是什么事？

translation.en: It's not the fact that… you killed my mother.
It's that you never showed up after, okay?
translation.zh: ‎是因为你事后就消失了 好吗？

translation.en: You didn't call. You didn't visit.
translation.zh:
‎斯科特 你不打电话
‎也不来看我 你不…

translation.en: It's 'cause every time I looked at you,
And then when I tried to come back around, you just…
translation.zh: ‎等到我试着回到你身边时 你…

translation.en: You seemed like you didn't want me there, so I assumed I should stay gone.
translation.zh:
‎你似乎不想见到我
‎所以我觉得我不该回去

translation.en: You know, maybe there's a chance we could still…
Maybe you could look into college somewhere.
We shouldn't need money. I could open a restaurant.
translation.zh: ‎我们不会缺钱 我可以开一家餐馆

translation.en: I was thinking artisan grilled cheese sandwiches.
translation.zh: ‎我在考虑做手工烤芝士三明治

translation.en: [clears throat] I don't know. It's a… it's a nice idea, but…
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 这主意挺好的 不过…

translation.en: I've spent so long hating you that I can't just turn that off.
translation.zh: ‎我恨了你那么久 没那么容易转变

translation.en: -That came out meaner than I meant it to. -[clears throat] No, it's all right.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我没想… ‎-我没想说得那么难听
‎-不 没事

translation.en: Let's just get this done. [clears throat]
I got the bride. I got the bride.
Not zombie-killing material, my ass, Mr. Vanderohe.
translation.zh:
‎还说我不是丧尸杀手的料
‎范德罗先生

translation.en: You've been here in the dark waiting for me.
There's another team of grave robbers.
They tried to cut their way in.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Oh, no. All they managed to do is to screw up the card reader.
translation.zh: ‎哦 不 他们把读卡器弄坏了

translation.en: [Vanderohe] Is it another team, or is it us, Dieter?
translation.zh: ‎这是另一支小队还是我们 迪特？

translation.en: I mean, look at them. It's us.
It could be us in another timeline,
translation.zh: ‎这可能是另一条时间线的我们

translation.en: fighting and dying, fighting and dying. And Tanaka…
translation.zh: ‎不断战斗 不断死亡 田中…

translation.en: And we, you, me, Guz, and the rest of the team,
translation.zh: ‎我们 你、我、古兹和其他队员

translation.en: simply pawns in some perverse play
where we're destined to repeat our failures.
translation.zh: ‎我们注定要重复自己的失败

translation.en: That's where the first pressure trigger is.
It's some kind of a booby trap, trust me.
translation.zh: ‎是某种炸弹陷阱 相信我

translation.en: If we could find something to trigger it…
translation.zh: ‎如果我们能找个东西触发它…

translation.en: By the way, I love your hair.
Easy, easy, easy. Hey, hey, hey.
You said you just needed a vial of her blood.
You know how much the whole head of one of these things is worth to my boss,
translation.zh: ‎你知道对我老板和政府来说 ‎这些东西的脑袋值多少钱吗？

translation.en: In the right hands, this is the power to make more of them.
translation.zh:
‎交给懂行的人
‎就能制造出更多这样的丧尸

translation.en: The power to control your own zombie army.
translation.zh: ‎控制一支属于自己的丧尸大军

translation.en: [Lilly] This isn't what we agreed to.
Well, you want your deal or not?
So you keep your goddamn mouth shut.
Why? They gonna come looking for her if she doesn't radio back to base?
translation.zh:
‎为什么？它们会因为
‎她没回复总部的呼叫就来找她？

translation.en: Her death cry. They'll have heard it.
translation.zh: ‎她被杀时的惨叫 它们肯定听到了

translation.en: Once they find her body, our trade is off.
translation.zh:
‎一旦它们找到她
‎跟它们的交易就无效了

translation.en: Come on, go get it. That's right.
All right, here we go. You can taste it.
-It's not the meat, it's the heat. -[Dieter] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-吸引它的不是肉 是温度
‎-好吧

translation.en: And the deterrent should be releasing
That was supposed to be nonlethal.
-That has to be illegal, right? -Good old Tanaka.
translation.zh:
‎-这绝对是违法的 对吧？
‎-不愧是田中

translation.en: So is that it, Dieter, huh? Is it safe now?
translation.zh: ‎就这些吗 迪特？他现在安全了？

translation.en: Oh, come on, Guz. It was just getting fun.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 古兹 好玩的刚开始

translation.en: Can you help me, Mr. Vanderohe? [gags]
translation.zh: ‎你能帮我吗 范德罗先生？

‎-好的 小子 没问题
‎-谢谢

translation.en: it will be either destruction or renewal.
translation.zh: ‎结局或是毁灭 或是更始

translation.en: That's heavy, brother. But I dig it.
translation.zh: ‎够沉重 兄弟 不过我喜欢

translation.en: The decision came down to the wire, but ultimately, the president caved
translation.zh: ‎决定到了最后关头 不过最终 ‎总统迫于压力 将空袭日与节日错开

translation.en: to the pressures to move the date of the bombing off of the holiday.
translation.zh: ‎总统迫于压力 将空袭日与节日错开

translation.en: This marked a reversal of his earlier position
that dropping the nuke on the Fourth would be, quote,
translation.zh:
‎于4日投掷核弹的承诺
‎引用他之前的话

translation.en: "Really cool and the ultimate fireworks show,"
translation.zh: ‎“终极烟花表演 真的很酷”

translation.en: and quote, "Actually kind of patriotic if you think about it."
translation.zh:
‎“其实想一想
‎这么做很有爱国精神”

translation.en: Due to fears that mounting anger from humanitarian groups
translation.zh:
‎由于担心人道主义团体
‎不断增长的愤怒情绪

translation.en: would cause the bombing to be postponed indefinitely,
the administration has made the dramatic choice
translation.zh: ‎政府做出了一个戏剧性的决定

translation.en: to not postpone the bombing but rather to move it up by a full 24 hours.
translation.zh: ‎不是推迟空袭 而是提前整整24小时…

translation.en: [newscaster] The scheduled drop time now coming at sunset tonight.
[newscaster] Keep checking back with us here.
[Martin] Think that kid has that safe open yet?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得那孩子打开保险库了吗？

translation.en: Oh, nice. I'm glad they decided to move the nuclear bomb up.
translation.zh: ‎真好 我很高兴他们把空袭提前了

translation.en: I was getting kind of antsy.
[Scott] We've got about 90 minutes before this place is dust.
translation.zh: ‎90分钟后这地方就会化作废墟

translation.en: Good. I actually found a pool.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我刚找到了一个泳池

translation.en: Gotta even this shit out. You know what I'm talking about?
translation.zh: ‎要晒匀称了 你懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: It's a little slower than we thought, but… we're close.
translation.zh: ‎比我们预想的要慢一些 不过… ‎快了

translation.en: All right. I'm just giving it a wash and wax, so hurry up.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我给飞机洗洗
‎打个蜡就好 你们快点

translation.en: -Hey, Dieter. How's that safe coming? -[Dieter grunts] Scheisse!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 迪特 保险库怎么样了？

translation.en: You see this? The four locks?

translation.zh:
‎-不知道
‎-不 你当然不知道

translation.en: It's a rotating randomization mechanism, right, Mr. Vanderohe?
translation.zh:
‎是一个旋转式随机化装置
‎对吧 范德罗先生？

translation.en: You just made me mess up, and now we're back to ground zero.
translation.zh:
‎你刚让我前功尽弃
‎现在又要重头开始了

translation.en: If you mess it up again, it locks forever.
translation.zh: ‎如果你再搞砸一次 就会永远锁上

translation.en: Okay, how long will it take you to open it?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你还要多久才能打开它？

translation.en: Mr. Vanderohe, can you please keep your team quiet?
translation.zh: ‎范德罗先生 请让你的小队保持安静

translation.en: I need to concentrate. Thank you.
Thirty minutes, that's not bad. Right?
translation.zh: ‎半小时 还不赖 对吧？

translation.en: Nuclear bomb drops on us in an hour and 20 minutes.
translation.zh:
‎核弹将在1小时20分钟后
‎落到我们头上

translation.en: Right, which gives us an hour to get to the helicopter and get out of here.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我们有一小时的时间
‎坐上直升机离开这里

translation.en: What's the alternative? Run for the edge of the city?
I don't think we'll make it.
No, we don't need an alt. We trust him.
translation.zh:
‎不 我们不需要备选方案
‎我们相信他

translation.en: Yeah, no, no, no. He's got it.
-Our guy Dieter can do it. -[Dieter] Ah, fuck.
It's probably how the last team got in and how those shamblers got down here.
translation.zh:
‎上一支小队可能就是这么进来的
‎蹒跚者也是这样下来的

translation.en: Hey, what do you think about tofu?

translation.zh: ‎豆腐 我的下一辆快餐车

translation.en: I was thinking, can make anything out of tofu.
translation.zh: ‎我在想 什么都能用豆腐做

translation.en: Tofu burgers, tofu fries, tofu milkshake, tofu cheesecake.
translation.zh:
‎豆腐汉堡 豆腐薯条
‎豆腐奶昔 豆腐芝士蛋糕

translation.en: I don't know what that is. Tofu cheesecake. I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道那是什么
‎豆腐芝士蛋糕 我不知道

translation.en: I thought maybe, since everyone's going vegan now, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我想 既然大家现在都吃素 ‎人类想明白他们不是食物链顶端了

translation.en: Humans are figuring out they're not at the top of the food chain.
translation.zh: ‎人类想明白他们不是食物链顶端了

translation.en: -[Scott] All good up there? -Uh, yeah. We're secure.
How much we got in the cart?
-[Guzman] Imagine what's in the safe. -Check this out.
translation.zh:
‎-想想保险库有多少钱
‎-瞧瞧这个

translation.en: That is the most money I've ever held in my hand.
As soon as that door opens, it's a rounding error,
translation.zh: ‎只要门一开 这里的就只能当…

translation.en: I'll take it if you don't want it.
No, that's cool. I got it.
translation.zh: ‎不 没事 我拿着好了

translation.en: I've done it. I've done it.
Wait, what? You did it? Like… like, "did it" did it?
translation.zh: ‎等等 什么？你办到了？ ‎真的办到了？

translation.en: [Dieter] The only thing that's left is to turn the wheel.
As it was inevitable that we won.
Mr. Vanderohe, would you do me the honor?
translation.zh: ‎范德罗先生 你肯赏光吗？

translation.en: All right, come on. Let's go, guys.
translation.zh: ‎好了 快点 赶紧的 各位

translation.en: We got about 20 minutes before this place is dust.
translation.zh: ‎距离这里变成废墟还有20分钟时间

translation.en: -Let's pack this shit up and go. -[Dieter] Yeah.
[Scott] Hey, Vanny, where's your head at now, bud?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 范尼 你现在觉得如何 兄弟？

translation.en: [Vanderohe] It's in a good place, Scott.
It's in a good fucking place.
-[Vanderohe] Let's go, Guz. Let's get it. -[chuckles excitedly]
Well, not just like old times
Hey, you can talk to me. What's up?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你可以跟我说的 怎么了？

translation.en: You're really stupid. You know that?
[Scott] Did I miss something? 'Cause we're richer--
I didn't come here for the money, dumb shit.
I mean, don't get me wrong, I'll take the millions.
translation.zh: ‎别误会 几百万我乐意拿

translation.en: But… I came here for you.
I thought we could have had something, but then you just… went away.
translation.zh: ‎当初我以为我们之间有感情 但你… ‎离我而去

translation.en: It's just that seeing you again is just… bringing it all back.
And it's not that I've been waiting. You know, I… I haven't. [sniffles]
translation.zh: ‎我可没有一直在等你 我没有

translation.en: I thought I'd fucked that up… forever.
I'm realizing that I've been wrong about everything.
About you and me, me and Kate.
-Hey, is Kate down there? -[Guzman] Not here!
Goddamn it! I know where she went.
[Maria] Scott, listen to me. Let's think this through.
translation.zh: ‎斯科特 听我说 我们好好想想

translation.en: -Wait for the rest-- -There's nothing to think about.
I know where she went. She's my daughter. I'll get her back.
translation.zh:
‎我知道她去哪里了
‎她是我女儿 我去找她

translation.en: I'm not gonna let you go out there alone.
-[Lilly] Hey, what are you doing? -[Martin] Whoo!
Martin, let us out of here.
[chuckling] Oh, my God, I got you twice. I got you twice.
Tanaka doesn't give a shit about the money.
What's in this bag is worth ten times what's in that vault.
translation.zh: ‎包里的东西比保险库里的值钱十倍

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna go kill that dumbass pilot,
translation.zh: ‎好了 我要去杀那个蠢飞行员

translation.en: now that she's fixed the chopper, fly myself out of here.
translation.zh: ‎她现在修好直升机了 我自己飞出去

translation.en: All right. We'll make a run for that elevator. Get up to the roof.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我们跑向那台电梯
‎然后去顶楼

translation.en: Martin said he'd let everyone out of the camps if I helped him.
translation.zh:
‎马丁说如果我帮他
‎他就会帮营里的人离开

translation.en: Come on. Let's go. Let's go.
-I know what I'm doing. Just go! -[snarls]
translation.zh: ‎我知道我在做什么 走吧！

translation.en: One more step, and I'll blow her head off.
translation.zh: ‎再靠近一步 我就爆了她的头

translation.en: Scott, was that a zombie in a goddamn cape?
translation.zh:
‎斯科特
‎刚才那是一个穿披风的丧尸？

translation.en: Kate's at the Olympus. We got to go get her.
translation.zh: ‎凯特在奥林匹斯 我们必须去接她

translation.en: How much time do we have?
You son of a bitch! If we do this…

translation.zh:
‎-凯特
‎-吉塔 我找到你了 你还活着

translation.en: -[Geeta] Oh, my God, Kate. Oh, Kate. -Oh, my God.
Kate, you came back for me.
-Are you bitten? -He hasn't gotten to us yet.
translation.zh:
‎-你被咬了吗？
‎-他还没找上我们

translation.en: Okay, we need to go right now. Come with me. Come with me.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们该走了 跟我来

translation.en: Wait, you guys… you guys hear that?
I know, I know. Somewhere between leaving your ass and saving my own,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 在丢下你们和自救之间

translation.en: Get in. Come on, let's go.
Hey. Hey, it's not so bad.
It's fine. It's not as deep…
You don't have to do that.
I've been thinking a lot, Kate.
It's got to be lobster rolls.
'Cause everybody loves a goddamn lobster roll, right?
translation.zh: ‎因为大家都爱龙虾卷 对吧？

translation.en: Everyone loves a goddamn lobster roll.
Hey, I got something for you.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我给你准备了点东西

translation.en: I know it's not millions, but
translation.zh: ‎我知道这跟百万美元没法比 不过…

translation.en: this should get Geeta's kids out of the camp for good.
translation.zh: ‎能帮吉塔的孩子们离开隔离营

translation.en: You go and make it right.
I'm so goddamn proud of you.
You're not a coward. [sniffling] You're not a coward.
You're the bravest man I know.
translation.zh: ‎你是我所认识的最勇敢的人

translation.en: Hey! ♪ But you see, it's not me It's not my family ♪
[Vanderohe] I would like to rent that gray and black plane out there.
translation.zh: ‎我想租下那架灰黑色的飞机

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir. Unfortunately, that's a privately owned aircraft.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 先生 那是一架私人飞机

translation.en: I'm not able to just rent you that plane.
Let me see what I can do.
Honestly, how do you ladies make that in that little kitchen back there?
translation.zh:
‎说真的 你们是如何
‎在那个小厨房做出这样的菜的？

translation.en: We should… we should make a toast.
One glass, one toast. It would make one happy man.
translation.zh: ‎一杯 敬一个酒 我就开心了

translation.en: It'd mean a lot to me.
-What the hell? Let's do it. [chuckles] -That's the spirit.
To quote the great Joseph Campbell, he said,
translation.zh: ‎引用伟大的约瑟夫坎贝尔的话

translation.en: "It is by going down into the abyss
where we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble,
translation.zh:
‎我们才能重拾生命的宝藏
‎你跌倒之处

translation.en: To the ironic twist of the unknown.
translation.zh: ‎敬讽刺性的未知转折 干了

‎敬讽刺性的未知转折 干了 ‎-干杯
‎-干杯

translation.en: [gasps] All right. All right. Let's sit back down there.
-I'm sorry. I'm a little embarrassed. -Okay. It's okay, honey.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 有点丢人
‎-没事的 亲爱的

translation.en: So, I'm gonna let the captain know.
No. Let me just hit the head
and splash some water on my face. I'll be good as gold.

translation.zh:
‎-对 站起来
‎-好的 谢谢

translation.en: -Let's get you in. -[Vanderohe] It's right here?
translation.zh:
‎-我们带你过去
‎-就在这里 对吧？

translation.en: -Yep, right there. That's it, right there. -Yeah, okay.
-[flight attendant] You sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
[pilot] Good evening, this is your captain speaking.
We will be beginning our final descent into Mexico City.
translation.zh: ‎我们即将抵达目的地墨西哥城

translation.en: I'd like to ask you to please return to your seat and fasten your safety belt.
translation.zh: ‎请回到您的座位上系好安全带
